message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob, but $80 is quite low considering the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
